Data: Ashwin to Hughes, no run tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
Ashwin to Hughes, no run he comes down the pitch and defends the flighted delivery towards off
Ashwin to Hughes, 1 run slightly shorter in length, allows the batsman to go back and punch it to deep cover
Ashwin to Finch, 1 run pushed through, but this is on the pads and Finch goes on the back foot to nudge it to deep square leg
Ashwin to Hughes, no run shimmies down the pitch, and pushes the length delivery to midwicket
Ashwin to Hughes, 1 run it's slightly short and bounces a touch extra, Hughes cuts it in the air, over the infield, but well short of deep point

Sharma to Hughes, 1 run a straightforward chance at point has been dropped by Virat! It was outside off and the batsman just plays a loose drive that heads straight to Virat, who is not able to hold on to this. Ishant immediately turns away and walks back to his mark
Sharma to Finch, no run back of length delivery, it's defended to mid-on
Sharma to Finch, FOUR runs now Finch gets a short and wide gift outside off and he accepts it duly, hammering it with a powerful cut through point

Sharma to Finch, FOUR runs another short and wide delivery, this one is not hit very hard, but he make sure he places it to the left of the point fielder, and it has enough legs to beat the third man fielder
Sharma to Finch, no run he bowls this one fuller and on off stump, the batsman comes forward to defend, but inside edges it on to his pads
Sharma to Finch, 1 run another length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to the left of cover fielder for an easy single
Ashwin to Finch, SIX runs he is getting a proper move on now. It was tossed up outside off and the batsman take full toll of it, smashing it over deep midwicket with a powerful slog
Ashwin to Finch, no run
Ashwin to Finch, no run pushed through on off, flat and short, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
Ashwin to Finch, no run again quicker through the air and heading down leg side, the batsman attempts a sweep, but gets hit on the pads
Ashwin to Finch, FOUR runs now short and wide filth outside off, it was quick as well, and all Finch has to do is run it past point, Ishant at deep point has no chance
Ashwin to Finch, no run he makes room and tries to force the quicker delivery through off, but is beaten by the bounce
Sharma to Hughes, 1 run length delivery on off, Hughes goes after this one, he attempts to loft it over cover, but it flies behind point and drops just short of the charging fielder at third man
Sharma to Finch, 1 run short of length outside off, the batsman waits and punches it to deep cover for an easy single
Sharma to Hughes, no run back of length delivery on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
Sharma to Hughes, 2 runs length delivery, but the batsman decides to go towards leg side, chips it over midwicket with a wristy flick, lot of bottom hand in that one
Sharma to Hughes, no run back of length delivery on off, cramps the batsman for room as he defends it towards midwicket

Sharma to Hughes, 2 runs length delivery outside off, and Hughes plays that wonderful on the up drive through cover, lots of timing on that again and Ashwin has to run around quickly to keep the ball from reaching the boundary
Jadeja to Finch, no run pushed through on the middle and leg line, the batsman defends it towards midwicket
Jadeja to Finch, no run he comes forward to defend and gets an inside edge on to the pads
Jadeja to Finch, FOUR runs he creates room and hammers it over cover with a powerful aerial drive
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run now he smartly pushes it to long-off for a single
Jadeja to Hughes, 1 run flatter delivery on off, the batsman punches it past the non-striker for a single
Jadeja to Finch, no run he comes forward and defends the delivery to cover
Sharma to Hughes, 1 run full delivery outside off, the batsman crunches a drive through extra cover, but there is protection in the deep
Sharma to Finch, FOUR runs short and wide, all the batsman has do is the beat the fielder at point and that he does with ease. That was slapped hard
Sharma to Finch, 1 run better delivery, this is around off stump, the batsman drops it towards cover for a quick single

Sharma to Hughes, 1 run length delivery on off, the batsman dabs it towards mid-on for a quick single and he has to rush to the other end as the fielder was on it quickly. But no direct hit, no problems
Sharma to Finch, no run he tries to punch this on the up through off, but gets an inside edge to the leg side
Sharma to Finch, no run stop the press, Ishant has beaten the bat! He gets one to straighten outside off and it just flies past Finch's bat as he looks to drive it on the up
Jadeja to Hughes, 1 run flatter and shorter on the stumps, the batsman goes back and whips it behind square for a single
Jadeja to Finch, no run slower this time and on the stumps, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
Jadeja to Finch, no run not short enough to cut, and Finch is beaten as it turns a touch too
Jadeja to Finch, no run tries to drive it firmly through off, but it's hit straight to cover
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run comes forward and pushes it softly towards long on for a single
Jadeja to Hughes, 2 runs fuller and on the stumps, Hughes walks across and flicks it to deep square leg, between the two fielders in the deep, for a couple
Kohli to Finch, FOUR runs bowls a gently 102 kph leg cutter outside off and Finch just runs it down past the diving man - Ashwin - at short third man, fifty for him. Well played
Kohli to Finch, 1 run stays in the crease and punches it down to long on for a single
Kohli to Hughes, no run he bowls a yorker from round the stumps, the batsman is surprised, but digs it out in the end
Kohli to Hughes, 1 run keeps it tight on the stumps, but it's pushed down to long on for a single
Kohli to Finch, SIX runs poor delivery, it's loopy half-volley wide outside off, Finch uses his muscle to carve it inside out over extra cover with a beautiful hit
Kohli to Finch, no run he shortens the length and the batsman punches it to cover off the back foot
Jadeja to Hughes, 2 runs Hughes able to steer this length ball through fine leg for a couple

Jadeja to Hughes, OUT Would you believe it! Dhoni has a leg slip positioned just behind and Hughes obliges by taking a back of a length delivery which spins into him, and he eases it behind, but straight into the clutches of Raina. My feeling is that he did not see him there in the first place, and mixed with the amount of turn, ends up leading to his downfall
Jadeja to Watson, no run Defended off the back foot
Jadeja to Watson, 1 run pitched up outside off and Watson drills this to extra-cover
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run pitched up on a fuller length and Finch pushes this through to mid off
Jadeja to Watson, 1 run on the same length and Watson reaches out to work this through to long off
Yuvraj to Watson, OUT How prophetic am I? He has taken out the Big Kahuna, with Watson lofting a fuller delivery on and around off straight into the waiting hands of Jadeja at long on
Yuvraj to Bailey, 1 run
Yuvraj to Finch, no run Yuvraj drags this one and Finch is unlucky to smack this straight to short extra-cover
Yuvraj to Finch, no run not much of air on this flatter delivery on the stumps, Finch stays back and blocks well
Yuvraj to Finch, no run gets on the back foot to clip this just behind square on the leg side, but finds the fielder. Bailey wanted the single though
Yuvraj to Finch, no run cuts this straight to point, and once again unable to get off strike
Jadeja to Bailey, no run Bailey gets forward to defend a length ball on middle and off

Jadeja to Bailey, FOUR runs this one a bit shorter and Bailey able to free his arms to cut in the gap between point and cover for a boundary. Deafening silence from the ground, although they may have just keeled over from the heat
Jadeja to Bailey, no run flighted delivery outside off stump, Bailey defends off the front foot
Jadeja to Bailey, no run lovely live here from Jadeja as Bailey successfully keeps this out
Jadeja to Bailey, no run Bailey tries to work this away through the off side, but finds the fielder
Jadeja to Bailey, no run fuller length and defended to the off side
Yuvraj to Finch, 1 run Yuvraj drags this one again and Finch seems to have all day to power this in the gap on the leg side, but instead finds deep midwicket
Yuvraj to Bailey, no run pitches this up a bit more and Bailey goes for the pull, but doesn't get good bat on it
Yuvraj to Bailey, no run this one pitched fuller outside off and Bailey directs this straight at short extra-cover
Yuvraj to Bailey, 1 run fuller length delivery that Bailey eases down to long off
Yuvraj to Finch, 1 run flighted wide of off stump and Finch able to steer this away on the off side
Yuvraj to Bailey, 1 run short ball and Bailey backs away to cut this square of the wicket
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run pitched up and Bailey drills this to long off with ease
Jadeja to Finch, no run this time throws in the straight one which Finch tries to cut away, but is not given the requisite space as he almost chops it on
Jadeja to Finch, no run a little wider this time and Finch tries to cut this away
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run Finch able to take this length ball and work it away through extra-cover
Jadeja to Bailey, no run fuller length just outside off that Bailey defends on the front foot
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run length ball and Bailey fetches this from outside off to steer through to sweeper cover
Yuvraj to Bailey, FOUR runs Yuvraj pitches this up and Bailey seems to have premeditated this as he goes for the sweep behind square that beats the fielder to the boundary
Yuvraj to Bailey, 1 run Bailey then does the sensible thing of taking a single off the next ball
Yuvraj to Finch, 1 run short of a length and Bailey gets on the back foot to work this away to long off
Yuvraj to Bailey, no run pitched up just outside off as Bailey defends towards point
Yuvraj to Bailey, 1 run short and wide and Bailey employs the cut to find sweeper cover

Yuvraj to Finch, 1 run Yuvraj lucky to get away with just a single as he drags this on a middle and off line which Finch steers towards long off. Finch is playing the long-haul innings here and trying to make his start count for something substantial
Jadeja to Finch, no run big shout for LBW, not given. Flighted delivery on the off stump, Finch leans forward to defend, misses and is hit on the pad in line with the off stump
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run Finch works this next one away to short midwicket
Jadeja to Bailey, no run
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run works this away to backward square leg
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run
Jadeja to Bailey, no run pitched up and Bailey tries to beat Jadeja to the left of him, but Jadeja quick enough to recover it and prevent the run
Yuvraj to Finch, no run cut away by Bailey towards point for one
Yuvraj to Finch, no run a little slower through the air and just outside off stump, Finch finds the man at extra-cover again
Yuvraj to Finch, 1 run
Yuvraj to Bailey, FOUR runs
Yuvraj to Bailey, 1 run
Yuvraj to Finch, 1 run
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run speared in on middle and off which Finch works away towards extra-cover
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run length ball and Bailey rocks back to nudge this through to mid on
Jadeja to Finch, 1 run back of a length and Finch works this away to cover point
Jadeja to Bailey, no run fuller length and Bailey opens the face to it, but is unlucky to find short third man
Jadeja to Bailey, no run length ball and Bailey drills this straight to mid on
Jadeja to Bailey, no run Bailey goes for the cut and Kohli anticipates well as he runs to his right to dive and stop the ball. Excellent effort there from the vice-captain

Yuvraj to Finch, OUT flighted delivery outside off and Yuvraj is having a whale of a time as he gets Finch to go for the lofted shot, but ends up mishitting this straight up in the air, which carries to Virat Kohli, one of India's best fielders, who is waiting at long off. Big wicket for India as Finch was threatening to play a big innings
Yuvraj to Bailey, no run flighted delivery again outside off which Bailey finds the man at short extra-cover
Yuvraj to Bailey, 2 runs Bailey able to complete two as he hits this towards backward point, who pounces on it, but ends up misfielding which allows for the second run
Yuvraj to Bailey, 1 run flighted on middle and Bailey waits on it before clipping through to long on
Yuvraj to Voges, 1 run tossed up outside off stump, Voges waits and drives it to long off to get off the mark straightaway
Yuvraj to Bailey, no run flighted on middle and defended back to the bowler. Good over from Yuvraj and India getting closer to controlling this match. Need another wicket to start to turn the tables
Jadeja to Voges, no run Voges steps forward to a fuller length delivery, and ends up defending back to him
Jadeja to Voges, no run this one spins viciously on and around off, and is worked back to Jadeja
Jadeja to Voges, no run flatter and outside off stump, Voges cuts it straight to point
Jadeja to Voges, no run fires this in on middle which Voges gets forward to defend to
Jadeja to Voges, 1 run Voges finally gets away as he clips this through to mid on

Jadeja to Bailey, 2 runs Bailey advances down to work this away through midwicket, and the pair run intelligently enough to scamper back for the second, which they complete with ease as the incoming throw is a bit late
Yuvraj to Voges, 1 run shortish delivery from Yuvraj and Voges cuts this away through point, with Dhawan diving to stop a couple of runs, but the batsmen still complete a single
Yuvraj to Bailey, no run fuller this time and Bailey unlucky to find mid off
Yuvraj to Bailey, FOUR runs this one pitches on middle which Bailey gets down on one knee to sweep behind powerfully, beating Ishant to the fine leg boundary
Yuvraj to Bailey, no run fuller length and Bailey tries to cut this away through third man, but almost gets him in trouble as it looks like he may chop on to the stumps
Yuvraj to Bailey, FOUR runs Bailey has targeted midwicket as this short ball is swatted in that region to the boundary
Yuvraj to Bailey, 1 run pitched right up in the blockhole and Bailey eases this through to long on
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run Bailey is at him straight away with a sweep square of the wicket
Ashwin to Voges, no run length ball which Voges defends to the right of Ashwin
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run lovely paddle sweep from Voges down to fine leg
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run short ball and Bailey gets back to sweep this straight to square leg
Ashwin to Voges, no run back of a length on middle and leg which Voges fails to work away
Ashwin to Voges, 1 run short again from Ashwin and Voges able to steer this to midwicket for a single, and retain the strike
Sharma to Voges, 1 run Voges greets him with a shot through to midwicket for one
Sharma to Bailey, no run back of a length outside off and Bailey unable to get it away through the off side
Sharma to Bailey, 1 run short again and Voges just angles the bat to steer this through to third man
Sharma to Voges, 1 run
Sharma to Bailey, 2 runs full and on leg stump as Bailey clips this with ease through to deep midwicket

Sharma to Bailey, OUT back of a length outside off and the Aussies take on Yuvraj's fielding, as he swoops in towards point and fires in a throw at the striker's end which Voges, who dives in vain, is unable to get to. However, once he gets past the crease, he curls into the fetus position, as he seems to be in some pain. But as I glance over he is walking back to the dressing room as th
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run length ball which Bailey works away to sweeper cover to get off the mark
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run Maxwell defends on the front foot
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run Maxwell once again sees this one off
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run tossed up on the stumps, Maxwell defends well from the crease
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run Maxwell finally able to steer this through to backward point
Ashwin to Maxwell, 1 run
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run back of a length on leg stump as Maxwell glances this for a quick single
Sharma to Bailey, 1 run short of length delivery outside off stump, Bailey opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man
Sharma to Maxwell, FOUR runs short ball and Maxwell was waiting on it as he is able to take it on with a fierce pull in the gap through midwicket
Sharma to Maxwell, no run back of a length which Maxwell gets on top off. Bailey wants the run but is sent back
Sharma to Maxwell, 1 run slower length ball outside off and Maxwell opens the face to steer through to third man
Sharma to Bailey, 1 run length ball again outside off and Bailey hangs his bat to get this through the same region
Ashwin to Bailey, no run pitched up and this one is the straighter one as Bailey plays for the turn, with the ball just beating the outside edge
Ashwin to Bailey, no run quicker and on the leg stump, Bailey sweeps it straight to fine leg
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run pitched up just outside off and Bailey able to work it away to the leg side
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run Maxwell plays this one inside out in hopes of finding space on the off side
Ashwin to Maxwell, 1 run Maxwell plays a bunted shot square of the wicket on the leg side for one
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run short from Ashwin and Bailey gets back to ease this through to long on
Vinay to Bailey, 1 run fuller length on and around off and Bailey straight drives this down the ground for one
Vinay to Maxwell, no run full again and Maxwell tries to find the gap on the off side
Vinay to Maxwell, 1 run short ball this time as Maxwell plays this under his eyes through the extra-cover region
Vinay to Bailey, no run back of a length again which Bailey chooses to keep this out
Vinay to Bailey, 1 run little fuller, but still short of a length as Bailey opens the face to steer this through the third man region
Vinay to Maxwell, no run short again and Maxwell advances down the track in hopes of bludgeoning through the off side, but finds cover
Ashwin to Bailey, 2 runs pitches this up and Bailey does a fine job getting two runs as he clips this through the midwicket region to bring up a well-played 50
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run full from Ashwin which Bailey works away to mid on

Ashwin to Maxwell, SIX runs Ashwin what are you doing? As he is about to release he holds in anticipation of what Maxwell will be doing, but it really doesnt matter as he offers a juicy full toss going down the leg side which Maxwell hammers over square leg for six
Ashwin to Maxwell, 2 runs fuller this time and Maxwell steers this through to long off
Ashwin to Maxwell, no run goes for the square drive but Kohli, at cover, has other thoughts
Ashwin to Maxwell, 1 run this time opens the face as Rohit comes into the fray, but is unable to prevent the single
Vinay to Maxwell, 1 run he gets a shortish delivery on off, which he drags down to deep square leg with an agricultural pull
Vinay to Bailey, 1 run he dabs it towards midwicket and calls for a quick single
Vinay to Maxwell, SIX runs oh beautifully picked up! This was a low full-toss on the middle stump, and it was a slow too, Maxwell smacks it well, gets down on his knee and launches it over square leg
Vinay to Maxwell, no run now a loose shot outside off as he misses the slower delivery
Vinay to Maxwell, SIX runs he is making the most of the powerplay, it's a fuller length delivery outside off and he picks it up over cover with the cleanest of the swings, clears the ropes easily
Vinay to Maxwell, OUT he has thrown it away, he tries to play a similar shot to what he played off the last delivery, but the length was slightly short, and he ends up toe-ending it straight to cover
Jadeja to Bailey, no run he goes back and chops it towards point
Jadeja to Bailey, no run flatter and quicker on middle stump, punched back to the bowler
Jadeja to Bailey, no run shortish and on leg stump, the batsman gets down on his knee to sweep it, but misses
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run he goes on the back foot and works it away to deep square leg
Jadeja to Haddin, no run slightly slower this time, Haddin comes forward and defends
Jadeja to Haddin, no run goes on the back foot and punches the flatter delivery to midwicket
Vinay to Bailey, 1 run he stays on the back foot and dabs it towards mid-off for a quick single
Vinay to Haddin, no run length delivery on off, the batsman stays in the crease and defends it to mid-on
Vinay to Haddin, FOUR runs short and wide, and that has been slapped past a flying Yuvraj at point
Vinay to Haddin, FOUR runs and he makes it two boundaries in a row with a beautifully timed drive through extra cover
Vinay to Haddin, no run stays in the crease and defends the length delivery back to the bowler
Vinay to Haddin, no run short of length delivery wide outside off, Haddin aims his pull to the leg side, but misses it completely
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run he stays back and clips it towards deep square leg for a single
Ashwin to Haddin, no run bowls the carrom ball which is defended back to the bowler
Ashwin to Haddin, no run he goes back and now pushes it back to the right of the bowler
Ashwin to Haddin, 1 run slightly tossed up and on the middle and leg line, Haddin goes for an aerial sweep, but is not able to beat the fielder in the deep
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run he waits on the back foot and taps it to short third man for a single
Ashwin to Haddin, no run on the back foot again and chops it on towards backward point
Jadeja to Bailey, no run quicker delivery on off, the batsman goes back and punches it to cover point
Jadeja to Bailey, no run that was actually too close to cut, the batsman is lucky not to chop that on, plays it towards short third man
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run again, close to the stumps, this time the batsman chooses to play with a straighter bat, punches it to deep cover
Jadeja to Haddin, no run he comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
Jadeja to Haddin, 1 run tossed up delivery, it's pushed to deep cover for a single
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run he dabs it to the gap at cover for another easy single
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run he stays on the back foot and punches it to long on for a single

Ashwin to Haddin, OUT this one is plumb, Haddin was deep in his crease and tried to flick this flatter delivery towards the leg side, but it was pushed a bit quicker too and Haddin was beaten to be hit right in front of the middle stump. That would have gone on to hit the top of the middle
Ashwin to Faulkner, 1 run he gets off the mark first ball with a soft push towards cover point
Ashwin to Bailey, no run he comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run tossed up delivery outside off and the batsman drags it to deep midwicket with a sweep
Ashwin to Faulkner, 1 run short and flat outside off, the batsman just nudges it through cover for a single, while a better batsman could have punished that one properly
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, 1 run it's short of length outside off, the batsman punches it to deep cover for a single
Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, FOUR runs short delivery outside off, it doesn't get up much, but Bailey plays a neat pull past midwicket, all along the ground and there is a huge gap there for him to exploit
Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, FOUR runs but the batsman plays a similar delivery smartly, pulls it finer on the leg side, between short fine leg and backward square leg
Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, no run length delivery outside off, the batsman steers it straight to backward point
Bhuvneshwar to Bailey, 1 run slower delivery outside off, the batsman waits and forces it to deep cover with ease
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, no run short of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it to point
Ashwin to Faulkner, 1 run he waits in the crease and dabs the length delivery to square leg for a single
Ashwin to Bailey, FOUR runs he makes room my moving outside leg and thuds this through extra cover, once it beats the man at extra cover, it picks up speed

Ashwin to Bailey, OUT and he holes out at deep midwicket! The shot was on though, it was a tossed up delivery on off and Bailey aimed for the stands at deep midwicket, he just doesn't get as much as he would have liked behind that and the fielder takes a simple catch right on the edge of the boundary
Ashwin to Faulkner, no run he bowls that carrom ball but the line is on leg stump, the batsman defends it to the leg side
Ashwin to Faulkner, no run now he comes forward and pushes it straight to cover
Ashwin to Faulkner, 2 runs tossed up and full on off, the batsman pushes it to wide mid-on for an easy single, but Ashwin was not watching the throw from the fielder and allows an overthrow
Vinay to Johnson, 1 run angled in to the batsman, who tucks it to midwicket for a single

Vinay to Faulkner, 2 runs length delivery on off, the batsman gives it mighty swing and it goes way up in the air towards deep midwicket, between the two worst fielders - Ishant and Ashwin - and it lands safely between them. It should have been Ishant's
Vinay to Faulkner, SIX runs another length ball, but this time Faulkner gets it in the meat, it's flat and it flies through that gap between Ashwin and Ishant again
Vinay to Faulkner, SIX runs and again, even bigger now, Ishant and Ashwin can keep looking now, this one is in the stands
Vinay to Faulkner, 1 run bowls a wide yorker now, the batsman can only dig it out towards long on for a single
Vinay to Johnson, no run length delivery on off stump, slightly slower as well, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run flatter delivery on the off stump line, the batsman stays in the crease and whips it to deep square leg for a single
Ashwin to Faulkner, no run slower this time, and on the off stump line, the batsman defends it off the front foot
Ashwin to Faulkner, no run even slower this time, Faulkner waits and then defends it to the leg side
Ashwin to Faulkner, 1 run shorter and quicker, but on the leg stump line, Faulkner shuffles across and clips it to deep square leg
Ashwin to Bailey, FOUR runs attempts a carrom ball, but this a wrong line, way down the leg side and it's helped to the fine leg boundary with a powerful sweep
Ashwin to Bailey, 1 run he comes forward and pushes it to long on
Vinay to Bailey, 1 run short of length delivery wide outside off, but Bailey forces it to deep midwicket with his pull shot
Vinay to Faulkner, no run length delivery on off, the batsman checks his shot at the end, plays it to cover off the front foot
Vinay to Faulkner, 1 run he waits and steers the length delivery to backward point for a single

Vinay to Bailey, 1 run length delivery on off, the batsman dabs it towards mid-on and takes the first easily, but then he thinks about a second. Vinay, in the meantime, had run to the ball and fires a throw at the non-striker's. Had that hit, it was curtains for Bailey, but he survives
Vinay to Faulkner, 1 run he stays in the crease and clips the back of length delivery to deep backward square leg

Vinay to Bailey, FOUR runs smart pull shot again! It was short of length outside off, instead of pulling it along the ground like he was doing earlier, Bailey chooses to go straighter and in the air, he finds the gap at wide long-on and it just drops short of the boundary
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, no run fuller length delivery on off, the batsman inside edge it on to his pads as he looks for a drive through off
Bhuvneshwar to Faulkner, 1 run he bowls a good yorker on off, which gets a thick outside edge and flies low to the right of Dhoni. It didn't carry, but Dhoni gets a hand to it
Bhuvneshwar to Johnson, no run attempts a premeditated paddle, but Bhuvi bowls it wide outside off, the batsman misses
Bhuvneshwar to Johnson, FOUR runs he misses his length by just a fraction, ends up bowling a half-volley and it's hammered down the ground, all along the turf
Bhuvneshwar to Johnson, FOUR runs and he errs the other way now, it's a low full toss on off and the batsman muscles it to the gap at deep midwicket
Bhuvneshwar to Johnson, no run another length ball and it was in Johnson's arc, somehow it misses the bat, and also the off stump
Sharma to Faulkner, 2 runs bowls a full and wide delivery outside off and he is lucky not to give away four, the batsman gets a toe-end in his drive and Jadeja covers it up at deep extra cover

Sharma to Faulkner, OUT Ishant gives a stare to the batsman! It was another wide and full delivery, and unlike the previous delivery, Faulkner gets a whole lot of bat in this one, times this one perfectly, but just hits it at catchable hight at Vinay Kumar at extra cover. The fielder times his jump and plucks it
Sharma to McKay, no run he drives the length delivery slightly in the air, straight to point
Sharma to McKay, FOUR runs back of length delivery outside off, McKay likes it, he flat-bats it to wide long-on boundary with utmost ease. The mid-on was in, and he is being sent back now
Sharma to McKay, SIX runs slower delivery on a length, asking to be hit, McKay swings and gets it right of the meat, sends it soaring in the Pune sky to the stands at deep midwicket
Sharma to McKay, 1 run he gets a low full toss that's driven to long-on for a single

Australia have done well to bring up a strong total here, 304. It was led by a well-controlled opening stand between Aaron Finch and Phil Hughes, and then there were excellent but contrasting contributions in the middle order by George Bailey and Glen Maxwell. On a pitch that is slow, Australia would be very happy with what they have achieved here. Yuvraj Singh conspired to slow the Australians

So the Australian fielders are in place. Shikhar Dhawan and Rohit Sharma are out at the wicket. India need 305 to win and they are facing Mitchell Johnson first up, who has a wonderful record on the subcontinent.
Johnson to S Dhawan, no run 147 kph, short on middle stump which Dhawan, rather hurriedly, tucks away to the leg side
Johnson to S Dhawan, 1 run 151 kph, short again and Dhawan able to cross-bat square of the wicket on the leg side to get off the mark
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 145 kph, full on and around off and Rohit off the mark with a drive through cover
Johnson to S Dhawan, no run 153 kph, short ball which rises appreciably. Dhawan does the smart thing and weaves away
Johnson to S Dhawan, no run 153 kph, length ball on middle and leg which Dhawan defends to the left of Johnson
Johnson to S Dhawan, no run 155 kph, short again just outside off as Dhawan weaves again to allow it through
McKay to Rohit Sharma, 1 wide 125 kph, and starts off with a wide outside off..
McKay to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 127 kph, back of a length which is tucked away to the leg side for one
McKay to S Dhawan, 1 run 127 kph, full and Dhawan gets a thickish inside edge through to the fine leg region
McKay to Rohit Sharma, no run 127 kph, this one pitches on a length outside off which shapes away appreciably
McKay to Rohit Sharma, no run 126 kph, length ball just outside off which Rohit gets on the front foot to. McKay utters a stifled appeal, but there was nothing in it really
McKay to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball again on the same line, looking to draw him forward, Rohit angles his bat to place this through point
McKay to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 130 kph, back of a length and Rohit works this away through mid on for a single to retain the strike
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run fuller length on and around off and Rohit goes for the drive, but the fielder at point is able to dive to stop it
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run 144 kph, right in the blockhole as Rohit drives this down the ground, but once again is intercepted by mid off
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run 146 kph, fuller length just outside off as Rohit tries to work it away
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run 148 kph, back of a length which Rohit opens the face to towards point
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run 147 kph, full again, wide of off stump, as Rohit shoulders arms
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 148 kph, back of a length which Rohit cuts away behind square for a single
McKay to Rohit Sharma, no run 130 kph, fuller length just outside off as Rohit hangs his bat, with the ball just beating the edge
McKay to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 128 kph, fuller length outside off as Rohit cuts this away behind square on the front foot, but third man is able to rein it in at the boundary
McKay to S Dhawan, no run 130 kph, full and just outside off, but shapes away upon pitching. Dhawan content to leave it alone
McKay to S Dhawan, no run 129 kph, back of a length outside off which Dhawan allows through once more
McKay to S Dhawan, no run 128 kph, right in the blockhole as Dhawan hits this right back at McKay, who deflects it to the off side with his hands
McKay to S Dhawan, no run 133 kph, back of a length as Dhawan is unable to work it away to the leg side, being cramped for space

Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs 144 kph, full and in the slot as Rohit goes for the expansive drive through cover, but Voges, stationed at cover, is able to get a hand to it to take some pace off the ball. Saved two runs there, Voges
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run 149 kph, length ball on the pads as Rohit glances this uppishly through square, but finds backward square leg
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run 153 kph, short ball on a leg stump line as Rohit ducks under it straightaway
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run 133 kph, full and in the slot as Johnson slips in a slower ball (if you call 133 kph a slower ball) as Rohit opens the face to it
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs 146 kph, full and Rohit will not miss twice as this is in the slow, with the square drive coming out in full display. The Australian fielders did not have a chance
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 1 wide 149 kph, goes well wide of off stump as Johnson is a bit miffed by the call, but it definitely looked like a wide on second view
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run 153 kph, back of a length that cramps Rohit for space as he struggles to work it away
McKay to S Dhawan, no run 130 kph, lovely length ball just outside off which Dhawan shoulders arms to
McKay to S Dhawan, no run 129 kph, fuller and in the slot, but Dhawan unable to beat mid off
McKay to S Dhawan, 1 run 130 kph, full again as Dhawan steers this to long off

McKay to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs 128 kph, full again as Rohit gets a low outside edge which fails to carry to Haddin, with the ball continuing on to the third man boundary. Lucky break for Rohit there
McKay to Rohit Sharma, no run 128 kph, back of a length delivery which swings away from Rohit
McKay to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs 128 kph, shortish delivery on the pads as Rohit whips this off the pads which almost carries to the fine leg boundary, but the fielder does well to stop it

Faulkner to S Dhawan, FOUR runs 133 kph, full and in the slot as Dhawan opens the face to steer behind point. Maxwell, swooping in, gets the ball and fires in a throw at the non-strikers, but the throw is wide off the stumps, and carries on to the midwicket boundary for four extra runs
Faulkner to Kohli, no run 135 kph, length ball just outside off which Kohli allows through to the keeper
Faulkner to Kohli, no run 135 kph, back of a length which Kohli inside-edges on to the pads
Faulkner to Kohli, no run 131 kph, crunching cover drive from Kohli, but hits it straight at short extra-cover
Faulkner to Kohli, 2 runs 136 kph, shortish from Faulkner as Kohli opens the face to steer this behind point for a couple to get off the mark
McKay to Rohit Sharma, no run 128 kph, back of a length which Rohit allows through
McKay to Rohit Sharma, no run 128 kph, this one is brought in closer as Rohit drops the gloves
McKay to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 126 kph, length ball outside off which Rohit gets on the back foot to steer behind point
McKay to Kohli, no run 128 kph, length ball on off stump which Kohli defends off the back foot
McKay to Kohli, no run 128 kph, back of a length which Kohli hits towards mid on
McKay to Kohli, no run 126 kph, length ball again as Kohli defends this watchfully
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs 132 kph, length ball outside off and Rohit goes for a lofted inside out drive through long off for a boundary
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run 134 kph, length ball on middle and leg which Rohit tries to work away to the leg side
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs 136 kph, length ball and Rohit is starting to open up as he clubs across the line for a boundary through midwicket
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run 136 kph, back of a length which Rohit gets on top of with ease
Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, no run 135 kph, length ball on and around off which Rohit defends manfully

Faulkner to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs 137 kph, Faulkner straying down the pads and is punished with a clip through to the fine leg boundary. Big over there for India with three boundaries from the bat of Rohit
McKay to Kohli, no run 128 kph, fuller length ball which deviates slightly away from Kohli's bat as it passes through. Lovely delivery there from McKay
McKay to Kohli, 1 run 126 kph, back of a length and shaping in slightly as Kohli works this away
McKay to Rohit Sharma, no run 131 kph, back of a length outside off as Rohit shoulders arms
McKay to Rohit Sharma, no run 125 kph, Rohit playing McKay quite watchfully here as he gets on the front foot to defend
McKay to Rohit Sharma, no run 129 kph, fuller length delivery as Rohit goes for the drive through extra-cover
McKay to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length and steered behind square for a single
Doherty to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs 90 kph, pitched on a length and Rohit steers this through third man for a couple
Doherty to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 91 kph, same line and this time Rohit pushes through to mid off
Doherty to Kohli, FOUR runs 92 kph, back of a length which Kohli rocks back to and cuts away to the square boundary for four
Doherty to Kohli, no run 91 kph, pitched up on middle and leg as it hits the front pad, with Doherty going up, but really, Doherty, really?
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run 95 kph, length ball which Kohli works away square of the on the off side
Doherty to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs 94 kph, length and width provided, and Rohit obliges by opening the face to steer this expertly through third man with a lovely, languid finish
Watson to Kohli, no run 127 kph, back of a length on middle and Kohli content to defend on the back foot to the off side

Watson to Kohli, 2 runs 125 kph, Kohli looking to steer this through extra-cover, but instead hits it towards the leg side. Hughes, taking the return from the fielder, fumbles it, and allows the extra run
Watson to Kohli, 1 run 130 kph, length ball which is angled away behind point
Watson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 131 kph, back of a length outside off which Rohit works away through the third man region
Watson to Kohli, 1 run 133 kph, back of a length and Kohli works this away with ease through the off side
Watson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 124 kph, Rohit will keep strike as he once again works this delivery outside off behind point
Doherty to Rohit Sharma, no run 90 kph, length ball which Rohit defends back to the bowler
Doherty to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 92 kph, pitched up which Rohit dabs down to long on
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run 92 kph, pitched up and Rohit steps back to direct this through the extra-cover region for a single
Doherty to Rohit Sharma, no run 92 kph, back of a length as Kohli gets on the front foot to defend
Doherty to Rohit Sharma, 1 run 91 kph, speared in on leg stump as Rohit tucks it away in front of square leg
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run 94 kph, length ball and Kohli rocks back to essay this through the off side for one, and keep the strike
Watson to Kohli, no run 133 kph, fuller length ball which Kohli drives down to long off, with mid off making a nice dive to cut down the pace
Watson to Kohli, no run 130 kph, defended on the front foot by Kohli
Watson to Kohli, 1 run 125 kph, length ball which Kohli gets back to and slashes hard at through the third man region
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run 134 kph, length ball and Rohit stands strong in defence

Watson to Raina, no run 139 kph, good change up here from Watson. Preys on Raina's weakness against the short ball as Raina is unable to keep this snorter down, almost ballooning the ball to the waiting hands of short mid on
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run 91 kph, Kohli fetches this from outside off to steer through to long off
Doherty to Raina, 1 run 91 kph, pitches this wide of off stump which Raina helps himself to, steering this to long off
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run 94 kph, Kohli able to work this away through the leg side for a single
Doherty to Raina, 1 run length ball which Kohli tucks away to the leg side
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run Kohli works this away to long off for a single
Doherty to Raina, 1 run 94 kph, Raina able to steer this down to long on for one and keep the strike
Watson to Raina, no run he pushes forward and punches the length delivery straight to point
Watson to Raina, 1 run here comes the short ball, the batsman swivels and manages to keep it down as well, played towards deep backward square leg
Watson to Kohli, 1 run short ball to Kohli as well, it rises towards his armpits and Kohli ticks it behind square off the back foot
Watson to Raina, no run he stays in the crease and pushes the length delivery towards cover
Watson to Raina, no run short of length delivery, Raina dabs it on off and thinks about a single, but the ball is not very far from the fielder
Watson to Raina, 1 run another short of length delivery, Raina shuffles across and dabs it towards midwicket to pick up a single
Johnson to Raina, 1 run double bluff! It's a full delivery on the stumps, and Raina had walked across to off, he flicks it to deep square leg
Johnson to Kohli, no run bowls length around off, 148kph, Kohli defends it towards midwicket
Johnson to Kohli, 1 leg bye keeps angling it at the batsman, Kohli is not able to get bat to that, but runs a leg bye nonetheless
Johnson to Raina, no run short delivery, but Hughes dives across and saves a certain boundary as Raina gets an under edge towards the leg side
Johnson to Raina, 1 run back of length again, Raina goes deep into the crease and hops while working it to deep midwicket
Johnson to Kohli, no run solid front foot defence from Kohli, he meets the ball right under his eye
Watson to Raina, no run he comes forward and pushes at a wide delivery, plays it straight to point. It was in the air for a while
Watson to Raina, no run length delivery outside, Raina gets hit on the pad first and the bat too, but it just drops short of the keeper.
Watson to Raina, 1 run he shuffles across the stumps and works the back of length delivery behind square on the leg side
Watson to Kohli, no run fuller length outside off, the batsman comes forward and crunches it straight to point
Watson to Kohli, no run now Kohli gets a good short delivery, he goes for the pull but it flies over the top edge
Watson to Kohli, no run another short delivery, and Kohli was in an awkward position, luckily it flew over his left shoulder
Johnson to Raina, no run he bowls a length delivery that Raina defends off the back foot, but MJ walks up to Raina and gives him a good proper stare
Johnson to Raina, FOUR runs fuller delivery, but down the leg side and Raina won't mind it, he flicks it in the gap at deep backward square leg with ease
Johnson to Raina, no run gets his line right this time, it's on the off stump and Raina is off his feet as he defends the length ball
Johnson to Raina, 1 run full and veering on the leg stump again, Raina whips it to deep square leg with ease
Johnson to Kohli, no run Hughes is doing great as the back-up keeper! Kohli got a thick inside edge past his off stump and Hughes reacted brilliantly to stop that from running away
Johnson to Kohli, 1 run back of length on the body, 152.4 kph, Kohli nudges it to deep square leg easily
Watson to Kohli, no run he comes forward and defends the length delivery to cover
Watson to Kohli, no run another good delivery from Watson, on a length, heading towards off, Kohli can just defend it back
Watson to Kohli, no run wow, another well-directed bouncer, Kohli wanted to pull that, but it gets big on him and flies past his helmet grill
Watson to Kohli, 1 run length delivery on off, Kohli dabs it towards covers and calls for a quick one
Watson to Raina, 1 run he bowls a slower short delivery which Raina manages to steer to fine leg, but not before he is almost across to the off side
Watson to Kohli, no run length delivery on off, the batsman defends it to mid-on
Doherty to Raina, no run he has dropped a straightforward aerial drive at cover, it's Faulkner
Doherty to Raina, no run he defends this off the front foot, to the off side
Doherty to Raina, FOUR runs now he charges down the pitch and slaps it over the non-striker's head for a much-needed boundary
Doherty to Raina, no run
Doherty to Raina, 1 run he has been lucky here! He wanted to turn the ball on the onside from outside off and got a big leading edge that bobs over to mid-on where there is no one
Doherty to Kohli, no run he wanted to walk down the pitch, but Doherty delivers this faster and Kohli has to defend it to off
Voges to Raina, no run flighted delivery on off, Raina pushes it back to the bowler
Voges to Raina, 1 run slower through the air, Raina dabs it towards mid-on for a single
Voges to Kohli, FOUR runs that's a foot to the right of extra cover fielder, but he didn't have time as Kohli punches this short delivery firmly to the boundary
Voges to Kohli, FOUR runs now he charges down, gets to the pitch of the ball and plays one of those wristy drives to the extra cover boundary
Voges to Kohli, no run he comes forward and defends this one solidly down the pitch
Voges to Kohli, no run pushed through this time, Kohli goes back and punches it to cover
Doherty to Raina, no run bowls it full outside off, but Raina can only squeeze it to point
Doherty to Raina, 1 run he presses forward, gets to the pitch of the ball and turns it to midwicket from outside off
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run he comes down the pitch, makes a little room along the way, and drives it to the left of long-on fielder
Doherty to Raina, 1 run flighted delivery, but not full enough, the batsman pushes it to long on for a single
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run pushed through on leg stump line, Kohli calmly tucks it on the leg side for a single
Doherty to Raina, 1 run pushed through again, Raina pushes it past the left of the bowler for a single to long on
Faulkner to Raina, 1 run short of length delivery ouside off, Raina steers it down to third man
Faulkner to Kohli, FOUR runs at his pace, Kohli has all the time to place his pull wherever he likes, he plays this rather well, placing it in the gap at cow corner
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run fuller length, he comes forward and drives it to deep cover
Faulkner to Raina, 1 wide short and wide outside off, swings further away
Faulkner to Raina, 1 run back of length and around middle and leg line, Raina shuffles across and clips it to fine leg
Faulkner to Kohli, no run back of length on off, 136 kph, the batsman taps it towards point
Faulkner to Kohli, no run oh that was close! The ball flies past the outside edge as Kohli tries to run it down to third man
Doherty to Raina, 1 run tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it through to sweeper
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run he comes down the pitch and whips it to deep midwicket for a single to bring in the half-century stand between these two
Doherty to Raina, SIX runs ah, he comes down the pitch and is nicely to the pitch of the ball, he lifts it straight over the bowler's head, heads towards the sight screen
Doherty to Raina, 1 run tossed up delivery on off, the batsman tucks it to midwicket and calls for a quick single
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run pushed through on the middle stump line, Kohli goes deep in the crease and pushes it to deep extra cover
Doherty to Raina, 1 run flatter delivery, Raina tucks it to deep midwicket for a single
Faulkner to Raina, no run back of length on off stump, Raina defends off the back foot
Faulkner to Raina, 1 run he dabs this one to cover and calls for a quick single
Faulkner to Kohli, no run back of length delivery on off, the batsman dabs it to point
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run on the pads and it's easily nudged to square leg for a single
Faulkner to Raina, 1 run short delivery outside off, Raina swivels it some discomfort. He gets timing behind it, but it's the shape his body is in that invites more of that stuff
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run he presses forward and punches the length delivery forcefully to the deep cover area
McKay to Kohli, FOUR runs oh beautifully hit! We have seen this a few times over the last couple of years. Full delivery outside off, driven stylishly through the infield, no stopping that
McKay to Kohli, 1 run now dabs the length delivery down to third man for a single
McKay to Raina, no run on the pads, Raina tucks it straight to short fine leg and Kohli rightly sends him back in time

McKay to Raina, no run length delivery on off, Raina dabs it towards third man, takes off for a single, but Maxwell at point cuts it off with a super dive and throws back in one motion, Raina had to dive back in to the crease
McKay to Raina, 1 run slower delivery on off, he waits and steers it fine on the off side for a single
McKay to Kohli, no run length delivery on off, Kohli takes a forward step and pushes it to point
Faulkner to Raina, 2 runs length delivery on the pads, Raina clips it softly towards deep backward square and calls for the second one early
Faulkner to Kohli, 1 run length delivery angled in from round the wicket, the batsman helps it behind square on the leg side
Faulkner to Yuvraj, no run gets a short ball, and Yuvraj gets into an awkward position as he expected that to come quicker at him, finally plays it towards point

Faulkner to Yuvraj, SIX runs he gets lucky! The crowd finds it voice, but it was a top-edge off a short ball. It flies over deep square leg, the fielder was interested, the bowler was too, but that cleared the boundary easily. Damn these short boundaries, nothing for the bowlers in this cruel world
Faulkner to Yuvraj, no run now he is beaten outside off with a length delivery as he tries to steer it to third man
Johnson to Kohli, 1 run wow, beautifully punched on the up to deep cover, just for a single though
Johnson to Yuvraj, 1 run bowls a low full toss on the pads and Yuvraj just manages to get his bat down in time, tickles it to the leg side towards square leg
Johnson to Kohli, 1 run short of length delivery on off, the batsman pulls it in the air towards deep midwicket for a single
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run he seems to be aiming for Yuvraj's toe, fires a yorker on off stump. The batsman blocks it out
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run here comes the short ball and it was slower one too, but it's wasted as it's wide outside off. Yuvraj sways away
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run he stays on the back foot and punches it through cover for a single
Doherty to Dhoni, no run pushed through on stumps, Dhoni defends it from the crease
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run again, pushed through a bit, but it's on the pads and Dhoni dabs it towards square leg for a single
Doherty to Kohli, no run bowls it a touch slower, Kohli defends it to off
Doherty to Kohli, no run quicker delivery, Kohli pushes it back to the bowler

Doherty to Kohli, 1 run he pushes this to deep cover to bring up yet another half-century. It's been a different kind of an innings, but assured nonetheless, against some really high-quality pace bowling from Australia
Johnson to Kohli, FOUR runs he angles it in, but Kohli gets an outside edge past the keeper. He was looking to steer it towards third man, but this runs down fine
Johnson to Kohli, no run length delivery on off, he plays this solidly towards mid-on
Johnson to Kohli, no run back of length delivery on off, Kohli gets on top of the bounce and defends it solidly again
Johnson to Kohli, no run length delivery outside off, Kohli punches this behind square on off side, but it's hit straight to point
Johnson to Kohli, 1 run he allows the ball to come with the angle and dabs it to square leg for a single
Johnson to Dhoni, no run bowls a yorker outside off for Dhoni from over the wicket, the batsman digs it out
Doherty to Kohli, no run he shimmies down the pitch, but is not to the pitch of the ball, check his shot as he plays it towards cover
Doherty to Kohli, no run bowls this slower and gives it a bit of flight, Kohli plays it towards backward point off the outside half
Doherty to Kohli, no run he fires this one on the pads and Kohli misses his sweep shot
Doherty to Kohli, no run on the pads again, Kohli wanted to whack it towards midwicket, but gets an inside edge on to his pads
Doherty to Kohli, no run pushed through on off, the batsman goes back and chops it down to backward point
Doherty to Kohli, no run pushed through on off, Kohli defends it to off
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run fuller length delivery outside off, Dhoni steers it down to third man, more of an outside edge there
Watson to Kohli, 1 run length delivery just outside off, Kohli allows it to come to him, then steers it to third man
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run short delivery outside off, gets big on Dhoni and he tries to pull it from outside off, gets a top-edge that drops well short of deep midwicket
Watson to Kohli, no run fuller length delivery on off, the batsman defends it solidly
Watson to Kohli, 1 run short delivery, Kohli is in a much better place to play that pull shot, keeps it down by rolling his wrists as he places it towards deep midwicket
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run back of length outside off, Dhoni goes deep in the crease and punches it to deep cover
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run pushed through on off, Dhoni goes deep in the crease and punches it firmly to long off
Doherty to Kohli, no run he comes down the pitch and looks to drive through off, but hits it straight to cover
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run exactly the same delivery, he comes down the pitch and this time he whips it to long on
Doherty to Dhoni, 1 run he stays in the crease and pushes it to deep cover for a single
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run he comes down the pitch, but Doherty pulls the length back, so Kohli pushes it to long off for a single
Doherty to Dhoni, no run tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it towards midwicket
Watson to Kohli, no run short delivery outside off, Kohli pulls it along the ground, but hits it straighter, to mid-on
Watson to Kohli, no run back of length delivery on off, Kohli looks to place it past point, but can't beat the man there
Watson to Kohli, 2 runs short delivery outside off, he goes for the pull again and aims for the cow corner, but gets a big top-edge that drops safely in the outfield

Watson to Kohli, OUT that's the end of Kohli! Watson, after sending a few short ones, slips in a length delivery and Kohli tries to whip this to square leg across the line. He is hit on the knee roll and that would have crashed into the leg stump. The umpire didn't waste any time. That looked plumb the moment it hit the pads. Australia on top here, excellent bowling from Watson again
Watson to Jadeja, no run he defends the length delivery off the back foot to off side
Watson to Jadeja, 1 run short delivery, Jadeja manages to keep his pull on the ground as he places it to deep square leg
Faulkner to Jadeja, no run length delivery on off, Jadeja stays on the back foot and defends it to point
Faulkner to Jadeja, no run fuller length outside, he comes forward and defends it to short cover
Faulkner to Jadeja, 2 runs well played by Jadeja has he slaps the short delivery in front of square, comes back for a couple by the time fielder from deep square leg clears it up
Faulkner to Jadeja, no run fuller length and wider outside off, Jadeja looks to push it to off, but it flies past his outside edge. One slip is waiting
Faulkner to Jadeja, 1 run back of length delivery outside off, Jadeja again pulls it in front of square for a single
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 leg bye length delivery on the pads, the batsman gets hit on the pads, but he takes a leg bye
Watson to Dhoni, FOUR runs length delivery wide of the crease, Dhoni waits in the crease and uses his wrists to power that past point for a boundary
Watson to Dhoni, no run he stays back and punches the back of length delivery to cover
Watson to Dhoni, 1 wide short delivery, but this one has been pounded on the crease by Watson and it sails over the batsman's head
Watson to Dhoni, no run length delivery on off, Dhoni stays back and defends to off
Watson to Dhoni, FOUR runs short delivery on off, Dhoni is deep in the crease and swats it behind square on the leg side for another boundary
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run length delivery outside off, now Dhoni dabs it to cover for a single
Watson to Jadeja, no run back of length delivery on the stumps, Jadeja clips it straight to short fine leg
Faulkner to Dhoni, no run fuller delivery on off, it was asking to be driven and Dhoni did, but then he is not able to beat the man at cover
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run short of length delivery on off stump, Dhoni drags it to backward square leg with a horizontal bat shot
Faulkner to Jadeja, 1 run attempts a yorker, but it's a low full toss on leg stump. Jadeja whips it hard, but it's hit straight to the man at deep midwicket
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run length delivery on off, Dhoni drops it on the off side and scampers through for a quick single
Faulkner to Jadeja, no run back of length delivery on off, Jadeja goes on the back foot but gets no room, defends it back down on the pitch
Faulkner to Jadeja, no run teases him with a wider line and Jadeja has a tame poke at that one, is beaten outside off
McKay to Dhoni, 1 leg bye bowls a slower delivery, 107 kph, and on the pads, Dhoni has to wait a lot for it, and it hits the pad as it messes with Dhoni's whip. It was heading down the leg side
McKay to Jadeja, no run another slower one, Jadeja wanted to force it to off side, but had to check his bat swing, he under edges it to the keeper
McKay to Jadeja, no run another super slower ball, Jadeja wanted to swing this one too, but it comes late and he is beaten outside off
McKay to Jadeja, 2 runs more slower stuff, this time Jadeja squeezes it past the diving point fielder to come back for the second
McKay to Jadeja, FOUR runs slower and wider, Jadeja was expecting the pace and flashes his bat at this to power it over cover point
McKay to Jadeja, no run bowls a quick yorker on off, the batsman digs it out to mid-on
Faulkner to Dhoni, 1 run he waits in the crease and pushes it to cover point for a quick single
Faulkner to Jadeja, no run back of length on off, no room for Jadeja, he can only dab it towards point

Faulkner to Ashwin, no run length delivery on off, Ashwin is in trouble as he dabs this to point and goes down for a jog, but the fielder dives and has a shy at the stumps.. The batsman had to dive back to get in
Faulkner to Ashwin, no run short ball again, the batsman sways out of line
Faulkner to Ashwin, 1 run short of length delivery on the body, Ashwin clips it to square leg
McKay to Ashwin, 1 run 129 kph, Ashwin opens the face to steer this behind point for a single
McKay to Dhoni, 1 run 130 kph, Dhoni waits on the back foot before turning this away to the leg side
McKay to Ashwin, 1 run Ashwin sticks his bat out to this delivery going down the pads to get a single and get Dhoni back on strike
McKay to Bhuvneshwar, no run 127 kph, length ball which Kumar allows through to the keeper
McKay to Bhuvneshwar, no run 129 kph, Kumar takes this fuller length delivery and opens the face, which almost carries to first slip, but bounces before
Doherty to Ashwin, 1 run speared onto leg and Ashwin clips this through midwicket
Doherty to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run 90 kph, Ashwin stretches forward to work this away down to long on
Doherty to Ashwin, no run 90 kph, Ashwin gropes for this one going down leg, and almost spoons a catch
Doherty to Ashwin, no run Ashwin tries to work this away to the leg side but ends up inside-edging onto the pads
Doherty to Ashwin, 1 run Doherty drifts one on the pads, clipped in front of mid-wicket for a single
Doherty to Bhuvneshwar, 1 wide fuller length and Kumar goes for the sweep, but this one was going down the leg side, so called a wide
Doherty to Bhuvneshwar, no run Kumar keeps this one out successfully
McKay to Vinay, no run 130 kph, full and just outside off as Vinay defends on the front foot
McKay to Vinay, no run back of a length as Vinay defends staunchly off the back foot
McKay to Vinay, no run back of a length and Vinay defends again off the back foot
McKay to Vinay, 1 run 107 kph, slower ball which Vinay glances to the leg side for a single. Both batsman are 1 off 4. Will someone please tell them to get on with it so we can go home.
McKay to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run 106 kph, another slower ball and Kumar tucks this through to mid on to retain the strike
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, no run 136 kph, back of a length and angling in. Kumar does well to keep it out
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, no run 138 kph, back of a length again as Kumar successfully gets on top of it
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, no run 139 kph, fires in a short one which rises appreciably, with Kumar bending back to go for it anyways, but to no avail
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, no run 139 kph, right in the blockhole as Kumar digs this out
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, no run 139 kph, Kumar drives this length ball straight to silly mid off
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, FOUR runs short again from Johnson and Kumar rests on the back foot to ramp this behind point for a much-needed bonudary. But with 99 needed off 36, it's all too late
McKay to Vinay, no run 129 kph, length ball which Vinay slaps away through the off side, but finds silly mid off
McKay to Vinay, 1 run back of a length which Vinay works away to the leg side
McKay to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run length ball from McKay, Kumar slugs it to long on for a single
McKay to Vinay, 1 run slower ball from McKay, Vinay nudges it towards short fine for a single
McKay to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run 125 kph, Kumar works this away to long on for a single
McKay to Vinay, no run on a good length and following Vinay as he rushed forward, hits the drive in the air but falls just short of Watson at mid-off
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, no run fuller length delivery outside off and slanting across the right hander, he looks to dab it towards third man and misses
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run 143 kph, Kumar hammers this straight to mid off for one
Johnson to Vinay, FOUR runs 142 kph, Vinay goes for a loft over midwicket, but ends up getting a thick outside edge which carries behind between keeper and slip for a boundary
Johnson to Vinay, 1 leg bye 144 kph, Vinay misses this entirely as it deflects off his pads to the same region, only this time a single is afforded
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, no run 142 kph, fuller length delivery just outside off which Kumar tries in vain to get at
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run 141 kph, back of a length which Kumar tucks away to the leg side
Voges to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run 84 kph, Kumar shuffles down to attempt a slog down the ground
Voges to Vinay, 1 run pitched up as Vinay drives this down the ground to long off
Voges to Bhuvneshwar, 2 runs low full toss as Kumar goes for the slog sweep to midwicket. Hughes running in but is unable to hold on to it
Voges to Bhuvneshwar, 2 byes darted in and beats everyone as Vinay goes for a wild swing
Voges to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run pitched up and Kumar goes for another slog, but squirts this through square leg
Voges to Vinay, 1 run Vinay advances down to this length ball to cross-bat through extra-cover
Johnson to Vinay, 1 run low full toss as Vinay Kumar has a flash at it, with the ball carrying to the off side
Johnson to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run 131 kph, back of a length which Kumar guides through third man
Johnson to Vinay, no run 144 kph, darted on middle as Vinay goes for another swipe
Johnson to Vinay, no run 143 kph, length ball going down the leg side as Vinay steps back to try and work this away through the off side
Johnson to Vinay, no run 148 kph, back of a length and Vinay does well to get on top of it
Johnson to Vinay, no run 142 kph, back of a length as Vinay defends staunchly on the back foot
Voges to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run pitched up on leg as Kumar goes for the hoick down the leg side
Voges to Vinay, 1 run length ball as Vinay advances down the track, and then checks his shot to work this away to the off side
Voges to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run darted in on middle as Kumar heaves this through to midwicket
Voges to Sharma, no run length ball and Ishant does what he does best. Blocks this out
Voges to Sharma, no run and does the same once again. If someone could remind Ishant he is playing in colours and not whites. Even if the asking rate is hopeless..
Finch to Bhuvneshwar, 1 run Kumar just lofts this down to long on and goes to the other end to see Ishant bat (snigger)

Finch to Sharma, 1 run what a terrible ball, and Ishant respects this as if it was a good length ball. This one lands somewhere near the median point of the wicket, and almost bounces twice before Ishant intervenes
Finch to Bhuvneshwar, no run flighted and on the stumps, Kumar defends it solidly

Australia 1, India 0. The bowlers have backed up a wonderful display of batting which began with Aaron Finch and Philip Hughes putting on an instrumental 110 run stand, before George Bailey came into the fray and scored 85 off 81, with some helpful cameos from Maxwell and Faulkner, to get Australia to 304. Even with a star-studded batting line-up, India were put to the sword by an excellent ope
We will have the match presentation in just a few minutes..

Well there you have it. Australia go 1-0 up in the series, against most of the expert's predictions, and India now have their work cut out as they need to keep Australia from winning the series 6-1 in order to protect their number one ODI ranking. Bailey will be especially pleased with how his players, both batsmen and bowlers, fared today, and it should give them confidence into the rest of th
Australia won by 72 runs
Player of the match is George Bailey, AUS
